snippet: Nuremberg and Eintracht Braunschweig were relegated on the final day of the Bundesliga, and Bayer Leverkusen clinched the league’s last Champions League qualification place.
lead_paragraph: Nuremberg and Eintracht Braunschweig were relegated on the final day of the Bundesliga, and Bayer Leverkusen clinched the league’s last Champions League qualification place.

headline.main: Bayern Celebrates While Others Are Demoted
headline.print_headline: Bayern Celebrates While Others Are Demoted
